sourceText: Consequences help teach our children responsibility for what they do.
text: Consequences help teach our children responsibility for what they do.

sourceText: They also allow discipline that is controlled.
text: They also allow discipline that is controlled.

sourceText: This is more effective than hitting or shouting.

sourceText: Take a Pause.
text: Take a Pause.

sourceText: Redirect.

sourceText: Give your child a choice to follow your instruction before giving them the consequence.

sourceText: Try to stay calm when giving the consequence.
text: Try to stay calm when giving the consequence.

sourceText: Make sure you can follow through with the consequence. For example, taking away a teenager’s phone for a week is hard to enforce. Taking it away for one hour is more realistic.

sourceText: Once the consequence is over, give your child a chance to do something good, and praise them for it.
